sub_title: Portfolio& Innovation Coordinator Ice Cream Europe at Unilever
summary: Experienced Technical Project Leader and Development Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the consumer goods industry. Skilled in Consumer Products, Project Management, innovation management, regional sourcing and supply network management. Continuous Improvement, Lean Manufacturing, and Material Requirements Planning (MRP). Strong program and project management professional graduated from Yıldız Teknik Üniversitesi.

school.name: Huseyin Avni Sozen Anatolia High School

profile_positions.title: Portfolio& Innovation Coordinator Ice Cream Europe
Product Developer and Tecnical Project Leader  RD,Foods

profile_positions.description: SC Innovation lead and regional capacity planning for Ice cream category for Turkey, Israel and North Africa
profile_positions.title: Regional Category Innovation Junior Manager Ice Cream

profile_positions.description:
•	Roll-out of innovations in the region for Foods category (dressings, savoury, spreads, desserts) ,develop the innovation time plan and execute against this time plan
•	Manage innovation business waste, ensuring minimization at lowest possible level
•	Coordinate supply chain assessment of Raw/Pack materials, manufacturing capability, capacity and availability regarding innovations by working closely with factories, procurement, quality teams. 
•	SC Interface with Category Group SC team for Global Innovation projects till Capability phase 
•	Ensure project risk assessments are in place for all innovations.  (quality and technical)
•	Define optimum sourcing network that will meet the capacity availability, cost and timing targets 
•	Partner BD and represent the SC in the global/regional innovation project meetings, prepare supply chain decision documents as input into IPM gate discussions for assigned innovation projects. 
•	Allocate innovation capability and capacity; support investment request process for innovations with the Category Technology Manager
•	Understand category growth assumptions in 8Q Funnel and translate them into volume assumptions as input for long term capacity planning.
•	Responsible from long term capacity planning to support investment process
•	Prepares, recommends SC network design for existing and new products, identify strategic/tactical sites, using duties and tax model.
•	Lead sourcing network design optimization (sourcing studies)
Drive simplifications on the supply network and on sourcing sites via identifying harmonization opportunities i.e., formulation,  RM, PM (primary and secondary), SKU rationalization and managing the portfolio in cooperation with BD through delist plans of tail variants/SKUs
•	Support Category Procurement teams to identify potential savings opportunities
profile_positions.title: North Africa, Middle East&Turkey Regional  Innovation& Planning Junior Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Plan and manage on time and in full FG supply from Unilever sites in different countries taking into consideration supply chain lead times, stocks and possible market demand fluctuations to ensure achieving business targets of UNICA
•	Understand customer requirements and ensure OTIF deliveries to customers
•	Monitor and update product prices on a quarterly basis
•	Communicate supply risks and constraints back to category sales team and agree on a new supply plan (including alternative sourcing routes, options) to achieve business targets
•	Manage all daily routines with forwards and carriers about routes, transportation rates etc.
•	Deal with all daily supply chain operations like truck arrangement, customs clearance, invoicing, insurances etc.
•	Responsible of evaluation of FG stocks and taking necessary actions for obsolete or slow moving products
•	Monitor required procedures for system definitions, opening/closing to order taking (SAP tasks)
profile_positions.title: Unilever Central Asia Sourcing Coordinator HPC

profile_positions.description:
•	 Responsible of doing operational sales forecast by looking at past trend and embedding future promotions, innovations.
•	Calculate the baseline forecast at SKU level (SKU:Stock keeping unit)
•	Calculate and manage FG safety stocks (including management of excess and obsolete stocks)
•	Communicate the supply constraints back to the category team and integrate them into the operational forecast
•	Organize and lead category team meetings together with Category sales manager
Evaluate the sales forecast at category level and make the appropriate adjustments to meet supply and demand
•	Highlight risks related to market conditions due to deviation from AP, stock movements by monitoring stock levels and channel based sales
•	Control and monitor promotional product stocks and productions
•	Prepare financial volume forecasts by taking input from sales & marketing
•	Upload operational forecast to the APO system for production planning
•	Report the balanced scorecard of the category team including bias, inaccuracy OOS,NPS and volume per channel
•	Responsible of  managing  NPD demand throughout the NPD process together with category sales manager
•	Ensure that innovations & relaunches are incorporated into the forecast
•	Ensure that live list of Sku & valid Sku mix is always used in demand planning  sheets.
•	Responsible of evaluation of FG stock lists and taking necessary actions for delist or slow moving products
profile_positions.title: Demand Planner HPC

profile_positions.description:
•	Took active role in the establishment of Unilever Turkey Customer Service Department
•	Worked on building “customer service awareness” within the company 
•	Worked in close cooperation with customers, sales and other supply chain functions to improve customer service level
•	Lead project teams to solve customer problems 
•	Participated and represented Unilever Turkey in ECR projects (Pallet pooling & 3PL project
•	Developed and coached the new customer service team
•	Determined and established supporting IT systems for operational success. (customer service reporting system, e-mail ordering, Remedy help desk software, NA safety stock program)
•	Reported and followed- up customer service KPI’s such as casefill OTIF & OOS index regularly
•	Made regular meetings with customers and sales to improve customer service level
•	Organised customer service surveys (Customer Satisfaction Surveys in 2000 & 2002 by AC Zet Nielsen)
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Lead HPC&Foods

profile_positions.description:
•	Determined raw-pack material shift establishment and capacity requirements according to production plans
•	Coordinated RM&PM availability at the right time and at the right place with the right quantity
•	Planned shift establishment, machine capacities and overtimes
•	Determined and monitored obsolete and slow moving RM, PM, FG stocks and notified related departments 
•	Participated actively to IPM processes
•	Controlled and monitored 3rd party production and informed buying department regularly about their performance
•	Operated SAP MM PP modules perfectly
•	Directed and lead call of suppliers, informed buying on regular basis
profile_positions.title: Production Planner PC
